lead_paragraph: To those who dip into swimming only when the Olympic Games come around, it may seem odd to hear a pool described as 'fast' when it looks much like any other large rectangle filled with water.

headline.main: Fast Swimmers Make Fast Pools, but Science Lends a Hand
headline.print_headline: Fast Swimmers Make Fast Pools, but Science Lends a Hand
